alert.note: Alert for Waupaca (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 16 at 7:40PM CDT until July 16 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN WAUPACA COUNTY... At 740 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Waupaca, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Fremont around 800 PM CDT. New London around 805 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Rural, Sheridan, Lind Center, King, Royalton, Northport, Readfield, Scandinavia, Weyauwega and Ogdensburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
